item.title: Display Jupyter Notebooks with Academic
item.description: Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks

item.title: Academic: the website builder for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website in under 10 minutes.

My research interests are in the areas of machine learning and discrete optimization. In particular, my goal is to improve discrete optimization solvers and algorithms by using machine learning. Recently, I have been also working on discrete problems that arise in deep learning, where continuous optimization methods fail and combinatorial algorithms are more natural. Particularly, I work on theoretical foundations and scalable algorithms for stochastic processes on networks. -- I did my Ph.
